channel.title: CVE Feed for Fahad Mahmood -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fahad Mahmood -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-49629|2024-10-20T10:05:32.080Z -- fahad%20mahmood -- endless%20posts%20navigation
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Fahad Mahmood Endless Posts Navigation allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Endless Posts Navigation: from n/a through 2.2.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-48024|2024-10-17T12:07:19.765Z -- fahad%20mahmood -- keep%20backup%20daily
item.description: : Exposure of Sensitive System Information to an Unauthorized Control Sphere vulnerability in Fahad Mahmood Keep Backup Daily allows Retrieve Embedded Sensitive Data.This issue affects Keep Backup Daily: from n/a through 2.0.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-44042|2024-10-06T12:01:41.313Z -- fahad%20mahmood -- wp%20datepicker
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Fahad Mahmood WP Datepicker allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Datepicker: from n/a through 2.1.1.
